attributes.action: Provide tax relief for travel industry workers during Covid 19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Many travel industry workers are having to take pay cuts and / or take unpaid leave until the end of the year. At this time we would like the Government to waive or reduce income tax.
attributes.background: Government to provide a rule so travel industry workers pay reduced or no tax during covid 19 pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of these petitions instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302233
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303081
